readme:
# heading-commenter package

A clone of the [file-header](https://atom.io/packages/file-header) package

This plugin for the Atom text editor will add a comment with identifying information
at the position of the cursor. This comment will be based on the language of the
file and the associated comment inside of the comments.json file.

This plugin can be run using the hotkey ctrl+shift+H. This hotkey can be changed
in the keymaps/heading-commenter.json file.

![A screenshot of your package](https://github.com/henchik/heading-commenter/blob/master/head-commenter-preview.gif)
